name: Scorecard for word games
description:
Featured as 'New and Notable' on the App Store
★★★★★

"A great companion to the old-fashioned board game"
-AppAdvice.com


A pen, some paper, a calculator, and 5 mins at the end of each game to tally up each players' scores. That was then. Now, all you need is this scorecard app!


★ FAST, SIMPLE, AND INTUITIVE INTERFACE

★ IN-BUILT CALCULATOR

★ IN-APP WORD DEFINITION CHECKER

★ 2-, 3-, OR 4-PLAYER MODES

★ OPTIONAL PLAYER-TIME COUNTER

★ SAVE SCORECARDS FOR LATER
